rooms.description: An open, inviting entrance with Art Deco motifs, featuring geometric patterns and rich textures. The lobby serves as a transition from the exterior to the living spaces, ensuring proper Vastu alignment with the main door facing the east for auspicious energy.

Spacious living area with Art Deco accents such as bold lines and metallic finishes. It features comfortable seating, a central coffee table, and integrated lighting that highlights the geometric aesthetics of the space. The room is aligned to the north for enhanced clarity and creativity.

A dedicated home theater area designed with soundproofing, dark luxurious interiors, and Art Deco decorative elements. The seating arrangement is centered towards the screen positioned on the west wall to ensure proper acoustics as per local building norms.

A master bedroom featuring an Art Deco-inspired design with streamlined furniture, geometric patterns in the wallpaper, and a private balcony. It is oriented towards the south to ensure balanced energy flow.
A smaller bedroom designed for a guest or secondary occupant, maintaining Art Deco aesthetics with accent lighting and decorative moldings. It is located to the east to complement Vastu principles.

A functional kitchen designed with modern appliances, integrated storage, and Art Deco design elements like chrome finishes. The layout is optimized for efficient workflow with the sink installed in a favorable Vastu position.

An adjoining dining space that connects with the kitchen, featuring an Art Deco dining table and ambient lighting. The area is strategically placed to ensure social interaction as per Vastu guidelines.
A primary bathroom adjacent to the master bedroom, designed with modern fixtures and Art Deco tile work. The placement is in accordance with Vastu principles.
A secondary bathroom for convenience placed near the guest bedroom, ensuring privacy and adherence to local building codes.

openings.description: Main entry door designed with Art Deco detailing and reinforced glass for enhanced security. Aligns with Vastu by facing east.
Large windows to maximize natural light, fitted with decorative frames reflecting Art Deco style.
Smaller window for ambient lighting without disturbing the dark interior ambiance, designed in Art Deco style.
Balcony windows with ornamental grills to ensure privacy while inviting natural light according to Vastu guidelines.
Practical window design for ventilation and illumination, incorporating Art Deco decorative elements.
